recent.title: Hollow
recent.body: In Hollow, you are one of the pilots that transports precious resource cargo from the mining ship Shakhter-One down to Earth. One day you wake up in an emergency capsule drifting near the facility. You don’t remember who you are, or how you got out there… All you can remember is an autopilot docking code for capsule dock NR 6.
recent.author: Mjölnir

recent.title: The Blind Prophet
recent.body:
The Blind Prophet is a Point'n'Click game where you will play apostle Bartholomeus in his divine mission: liberate the corrupted city of Rotbork, and brave the Great Evil that lurks within.

Although he's used to execute his duty, it won't be as easy as it should be this time...
recent.author: Mjölnir

recent.title: Book of Demons
recent.body: Book of Demons is a Hack & Slash Deck-building hybrid in which YOU decide the length of quests. Wield magic cards instead of weapons and slay the armies of darkness in the dungeons below the Old Cathedral. Save the terror-stricken Paperverse from the clutches of the Archdemon himself!
recent.author: Mjölnir

recent.title: Hunt: Showdown
recent.body:
Savage, nightmarish monsters roam the Louisiana swamps, and you are part of a group of rugged bounty hunters bound to rid the world of their ghastly presence. Banish these creatures from our world, and you will be paid generously—and given the chance to buy more gruesome and powerful weapons. Fail, and death will strip you of both character and gear. Your experience, however, remains in your pool of hunters—called your Bloodline—always.

Hunt: Showdown is a competitive first-person PvP bounty hunting game with heavy PvE elements, from the makers of Crysis. Set in the darkest corners of the world, it packs the thrill of survival games into a match-based format.
recent.author: Mjölnir

recent.title: Monolith
recent.body: Monolith is a top down action shooter with procedurally generated elements. Explore a progression of floors as you make your way into the depths of the facility, encountering increasingly deadly enemies, fantastic weapons, upgrades, choices and revelations as you venture deeper towards a great and calamitous power.
recent.author: Mjölnir

recent.title: Space Hulk: Deathwing
recent.body:
Space Hulk: Deathwing is a First-Person Shooter based on Games Workshop’s cult classic board game set in Warhammer 40,000 universe. Expanding upon the original game, and featuring a host of new content, new features and a richer multiplayer mode, the Enhanced Edition is the ultimate Space Hulk: Deathwing experience.

Play as a Terminator of the Deathwing – the feared 1st Company comprised of the elite of the secretive Space Marine Chapter, the Dark Angels – and engage in a desperate battle against Genestealers, within the claustrophobic confines of a Space Hulk. Grow stronger, gaining skills, new abilities, and powerful equipment as you earn experience across perilous missions. The Enhanced Edition brings a host of fresh features to enjoy in both solo and multiplayer: a new class, an expanded arsenal, deadly new enemies, a deep online customisation system, and a new Special Missions mode bringing infinite replayability with randomly-generated missions for every game chapter.
recent.author: Mjölnir

recent.author: Mjölnir

recent.title: SCUM
recent.body:
Scum is a unique game. The best way to define it is to talk about a love relationship between PUBG and DayZ. A refreshing combination of survival, shooter and Battle Royale in which we have to survive the rest of the players using all the survival techniques we have in our hands.

The game has a metabolic simulation system with complexity and depth never seen before in a video game. In addition, it gives us realistic ballistics inherited from games such as those in the Interactive Bohemian Arma saga and a technical section at the height of the circumstances.

In Scum we can wander through the huge world of hundreds of kilometers, create our home, ransack houses, towns or military locations and get equipment to defend ourselves or attack the rest of player. In the world of Scum there are also zombies that roam the previously populated areas of the map and are not a danger when they are alone, but if they come together... they can cause big troubles.

In addition, we have classic shooter games such as Capture the Flag, Deathmatch, Team Dethmatch and even interpretations of Battle Royale. An unforgettable experience and much better if you enjoy accompanied by friends.
recent.author: Mjölnir

recent.title: Ancestors Legacy
recent.body:
Take command of your army as you storm through medieval Europe in an extensive series of campaigns. Choosing one of the four available nations – Viking, Anglo-Saxon, German, Slav – you will be tasked with more than just conquering, raiding and pillaging enemy camps, villages and towns. Only by utilizing the full range of available tactical options, taking strategic advantage of the environment, and managing your temporary bases and settlements, will you emerge victorious.

Ancestors Legacy is a history-inspired real-time strategy game influenced by historical events in the Middle Ages. The game combines resource management and base building with large-scale, squad-based battles across vast battlefields, all rendered in great detail thanks to the Unreal Engine 4 tech. Experience medieval bloodshed like never before, thanks to the cinematic action camera that puts you right in the middle of the battle at the press of a button.
recent.author: Mjölnir

recent.title: Effie
recent.body:
Effie is a 3D action-adventure game that combines classic elements from the genre, such as combat, platforming, and puzzles, with the exploration of an expanded world. Live a unique fantasy adventure, free the cities from a powerful and dark evil, and relive the look and feel of old-school video-games!

Experience a unique adventure!

Delve into the adventure of Galand, a young man in his quest to recover his youth after a witch cursed him with premature old age. Defeat all the sinister creatures, overcome all the platforming challenges and solve the most complex puzzles!

Runestone, your travel companion.

A powerful black magic controls the cities of the region of Oblena. To face evil, you will carry a magic shield that will allow you to defend yourself, to fight and to surf across the red grassland. It will gradually grow in power and skills!
recent.author: Mjölnir

recent.title: Microsoft Flight Simulator 2020
recent.body:
With Microsoft Flight Simulator 2020, the flight simulators have taken the representation of the world to another level. Thanks to the latest advances in technology, we will be able to enjoy an entire globe to fly over and visit practically any city in the world.

The representation of the globe in Flight Simulator 2020 is not limited to the faithful presentation of cities and terrain, it also focuses on the small details that make a flight simulator better or worse than another. Clouds, wind or rain will be perfectly represented in the game and will affect the piloting. We can even see the contamination of some urban centers.

Microsoft Flight Simulator 2020 is not only a game for the fans of the flight simulation. This time it brings a series of tips for the new player that will make possible for anyone to fly without problems across the globe.

Maybe sometime in life we will ​​need to use our piloting skills to flee from a zombie crisis or something even worse. Do not miss the opportunity to enjoy this title.

recent.title: Chronology
recent.body: Chronology is an amazing puzzle and platform game. An adventure, in which you will challenge time manipulating the past and the future to fix the present. Pleasant cartoon aesthetics and a fair difficulty for the whole family are the cherry on the cake on this relaxing and entertaining experience.

recent.body:
Greetings Esports fans!

We bring you a new edition of the Zula Europe Masters so you can compete with the best teams in the competitive scene of Zula.

- All matches will be best of 1 (Bo1) except the Final and the match for the third and fourth place, which will be best of 3 (Bo3).

- Veto system:

Bo1:

1. BAN 1st team
2. BAN 2nd team
3. BAN 1st team
4. BAN 2nd team
5. LAST MAP - 1st team pick side (the one in the upper bracket)

Bo3:
1. Team 1 - Ban
2. Team 2 - Ban
3. Team 1 - Choose Map | Team 2 - Choose Side
4. Team 2 - Choose Map | Team 1 - Choose Side
5. Last map - The team that wins the most rounds in the two previous matches Choose Side

recent.title: Back to Bed
recent.body:
Back to Bed is a puzzle game that invites us to guide the protagonist until he reaches his bed through different levels.

Good references such as Escher or the Labyrinth movie enrich the universe of the game. An intelligent and interactive artistic work, for all ages and with increasing difficulty. In addition, in each world the developers will show us new mechanics that prevent the game from becoming repetitive.

recent.title: Do Not Feed The Monkeys
recent.body:
Dear Sir/Madam,

We invite you to join the first Digital Voyeur Simulator. We can offer you a whole new world of exciting opportunities, including:

• MONITORING strangers through webcams and surveillance cameras!
• PRYING INTO the private lives of dozens of people you've never met!
• EXPERIENCING fun, surprising, horrific, and dramatic themed narratives!

To keep your personal life safe and secure, we operate under the cover of a wildlife conservation society called "The Primate Observation Club". We only ask one thing of you: DO NOT interact with the observed subjects. DO NOT FEED THE MONKEYS!

See you,

The Primate Observation Club

P.S. Attached are 5 more reasons to join the Club.

Developed by The Studio of Secret6, Inc., a Philippines based studio, and Published by IDC/Games, a Spain based Game Publisher for PC and Mobile games, Project Xandata aims to innovate the action games genre with its stunning graphics and unmatched dynamic gameplay experience.

Players can play now for free at enjoy the Closed Beta at IDC/Games platform.

popular.title: Welcome Blockpost!
popular.body:
Blockpost lands at IDC/Games with its polished pixel aesthetic that will delight fans of shooters with retro touches.

The game has been developed by the Kazakhstani studio Skullcap Studios that has focused on creating a procedural cubic 3D-shooter with the best mechanics within its genre. The game has 7 game modes that take place in totally unique maps, more than 100 different weapons and a clan system thanks to which you can group with your friends to crush pixels and enemies.

We encourage you to download this magnificent game and to have a fun time together with the rest of the players, but… Do not let them kill you! Build covers thanks to the resources you have available and cross the map by chopping through walls, digging in the ground or jumping over obstacles.

Welcome Blockpost!

recent.title: IDC/Games announces HeroVersus, a PC and mobile free to play fighting game!
recent.body:
IDC/Games has announced today HeroVersus a PvP cross-platform multiplayer fighting game that will be published for Europe and Latin America. The game also features single player mode like survival and arcade on top of the multiplayer PvP with ranked competitive games allowing mobile players playing against PC players.

Developed by TheVersus co., a Canada based studio, and Published by IDC/Games, a Spain based Game Publisher for PC and Mobile games, Heroversus aims to set itself as a new standard in cross-platform fighting games.  The game will be available at launch for mobile users with an Android version and iOS version for Apple devices and Steam. It will be available in English, French, Italian, German, Spanish, Polish and Turkish.

Game description and features:

HeroVersus is a mobile and PC fighting 2D scrolling free to play game with actual  online cross-platform  PVP with players from PC version, Steam version, Android version and iOS version fighting in the same servers for ranking domination.

The Story of HeroVersus is set in an alternative universe during the World War II era, in which the Axis was victorious. The heroes have to travel back in time to battle the enemy, kick ass, and save the world from their domination. The story is told via a short comic series consisting of over 70 pages of narrative content, viewable directly in the game, and being unlocked as the player progresses through the game

The game has several game modes, from a casual game mode, practice mode, survival and ranked games focused on future tournaments and esports.

HeroVersus runs away from the pay to win model, players can download and play for free and fight for the win using in their playing skill. The game will sell characters and costume skins, and other cosmetic articles for players to enjoy it. There is no difference between paying and non-paying players in gameplay and only the best can win!

Game features:

- Casual and pro gaming: HeroVersus is designed for casual players as a step stone into fighting game community and then grow from there to the esports metagame. The character handling in the fights is easy and institutive for new and pro players.
- Socially connected HeroVersus is not only a game, it is also a social messaging app allows instant chat with other players and the game will push the latest community news to keep everyone updated! Stay Connected!
- 11 characters to start, each of them with its own fighting style
- Ongoing comic series “The Story of HeroVersus” into the game

recent.title: IDC/Games - Roadmap 2020
recent.body:
Witajcie, gracze IDC!

IDC/Games przechodzi przemianę, aby stać się platformą dystrybucyjną gier komputerowych z nowymi funkcjami i usługami dla graczy, jak i dla twórców oraz wydawców gier! Chcemy się z Wami podzielić niektórymi z naszych planów na najbliższą i dalszą przyszłość.

Nasz plan działania “2020 Roadmap” może ulec niezapowiedzianym zmianom, a niektóre z modyfikacji mogą nie być gotowe przed końcem tego roku. Niektóre z funkcji, które mają być dostępne wkrótce na platformie IDC/Games to:

• Gry Premium
• Chat i Lista znajomych
• IDC Clips (aplikacja do nagrywania gameplejów i zarazem edytor)
• Streaming (transmisje będą widoczne na stronie danej gry)
• Recenzje gier
• Program dla stałych klientów

Aby uzyskać więcej informacji zobacz nasz otwarty profil na Trello: IDC/Games

Jeśli jesteś twórcą lub wydawcą gier i chciałbyś żeby IDC/Games było ich dystrybutorem, sprawdź poniższe informacje: https://developer.id...ameintegration/

Naszym celem jest stworzenie platformy gier, która będzie użyteczna, oraz źródłem radości dla naszych graczy i zawsze otwarta na ich sugerencje.

IDC/Games – tam gdzie łączą się gracze i gry.

recent.title: The new Demir
recent.body: It was a breezy summer day. Demir was actively taking part in a long-lasting battle between Zula and Gladyo. Just as he was capturing and defusing the bomb planted by Gladyo, he realized he was in an ambush. 4 Gladyo members had him surrounded and they launched dual grenades to Demir’s spot. Luckily, some Zula members could reach Demir and took him to the hospital before it was too late. After the recovery he managed to survive but some things changed. He got multiple plastic surgeries and yet couldn't go back to his old self. Something good is that he is still with us and even though he has a new face, he still has a lot of ambition to fight against Gladyo!

recent.title: IDC/Games announces the Closed Beta of Project Xandata
recent.body:
The Closed Beta will start in April with 3 games modes, 3 maps and 3 classes to choose from in this fast paced and team-based arena shooter.

IDC/Games announced today that the Closed Beta of Project Xandata, an online free to play 3v3 competitive shooter full of fast paced action, skill and team play based game modes will be happening next April on a date still to be disclosed.

Developed by The Studio of Secret6, Inc., a Philippines based studio, and Published by IDC/Games, a Spain based Game Publisher for PC and Mobile games, Project Xandata aims to innovate the action games genre with its stunning graphics and unmatched dynamic gameplay experience.

The game will be available for PC users at IDC/Games platform. It will be localized to English, French, Italian, German, Spanish, Polish and Turkish.

Game description and features:

Project Xandata is a free to play online competitive first-person shooter (FPS) where players battle it out in this PvP arena shooter. Players become a Xandat, one of the best soldiers Xandaigdig has to offer. From the combined strength, technology, and weaponry of the Seven Great Nations come a new breed of warriors that fought against other-worldly enemies to bring the world back from the brink of extinction. Players will need to gear up and customize their armor to their personal playstyle as they fight to prove themselves against other Xandats.

Game modes:

- Skirmish - Xandat teams fight in a time-limited skirmish. Each enemy kill will earn points for the team. The first team to reach the appointed Score Value wins. More elaborate take-downs get bonus points. In case of the match reaching the time-limit, the team with the most points win.
- Annihilation - Xandat teams face off against each other as they try to wipe the enemy team out in pure weaponized combat. Each team is granted a set number of revives to use in a round. The winner of each round is determined by the last Xandat standing. The overall winner is determined by a race to win 5 rounds during the match.
- Corruption - Xandat teams score points by collecting shards dropped by fallen opponents. Enemy points can be denied by collecting dropped shards by team members. Every now and then, an Obelisk will spawn around the map, that when destroyed, will drop multiple shards to collect. The team to reach the goal score or the team with most points by time limit shall win the match.

recent.title: Weapons: Blast
recent.body:
The Blast is a minigun that has two different fire modes so that it can be used offensively from different ranges.

The minguns are multi-cannon machine guns with a high rate of fire (thousands of bullets per minute), which employ the rotating cannons Gatling system powered by an electric motor fueled from an external power source.

This weapon has two shooting modes:

Mode 1 (Left mouse button) -> A moderate rate of fire is used to inflict damage from a wider range. The base damage of each bullet is 14 points.
Mode 2 (Right mouse button) -> It considerably increases the rate of fire but decreases the the Guard’s movement speed. The base damage of each bullet is 28 points.

The base damage of each projectile increases based on the level points of each weapon and the statistics vary based on the selected improvement.

Upgrades:

- "Samurai" Fire mod -> Headshots inflict more damage. Incoming damage is reduced as long as Fire Mode 2 is active.
- "Berserk" Fire mod -> Headshots inflict more damage. Fire Mode 2 damage is increased as Guard's durability decreases.
- "Rook" Fire mod -> Blast's hits slow down the enemies. Incoming damage is reduced as long as Fire Mode 2 is active.
- "Gladiator" Fire mod -> Blast's hits slow down the enemies. Fire Mode 2 damage is increased as Guard's durability decreases.

popular.title: IDC/Games announces the Closed Beta of Project Xandata
popular.body:
The Closed Beta will start in April with 3 games modes, 3 maps and 3 classes to choose from in this fast paced and team-based arena shooter.

IDC/Games announced today that the Closed Beta of Project Xandata, an online free to play 3v3 competitive shooter full of fast paced action, skill and team play based game modes will be happening next April on a date still to be disclosed.

Developed by The Studio of Secret6, Inc., a Philippines based studio, and Published by IDC/Games, a Spain based Game Publisher for PC and Mobile games, Project Xandata aims to innovate the action games genre with its stunning graphics and unmatched dynamic gameplay experience.

The game will be available for PC users at IDC/Games platform. It will be localized to English, French, Italian, German, Spanish, Polish and Turkish.

Game description and features:

Project Xandata is a free to play online competitive first-person shooter (FPS) where players battle it out in this PvP arena shooter. Players become a Xandat, one of the best soldiers Xandaigdig has to offer. From the combined strength, technology, and weaponry of the Seven Great Nations come a new breed of warriors that fought against other-worldly enemies to bring the world back from the brink of extinction. Players will need to gear up and customize their armor to their personal playstyle as they fight to prove themselves against other Xandats.

Game modes:

- Skirmish - Xandat teams fight in a time-limited skirmish. Each enemy kill will earn points for the team. The first team to reach the appointed Score Value wins. More elaborate take-downs get bonus points. In case of the match reaching the time-limit, the team with the most points win.
- Annihilation - Xandat teams face off against each other as they try to wipe the enemy team out in pure weaponized combat. Each team is granted a set number of revives to use in a round. The winner of each round is determined by the last Xandat standing. The overall winner is determined by a race to win 5 rounds during the match.
- Corruption - Xandat teams score points by collecting shards dropped by fallen opponents. Enemy points can be denied by collecting dropped shards by team members. Every now and then, an Obelisk will spawn around the map, that when destroyed, will drop multiple shards to collect. The team to reach the goal score or the team with most points by time limit shall win the match.

popular.title: Upgrades: Firebug
popular.body:
Below we will explain the different skill upgrades of the Firebug. The main goal of this class is to inflict area damage to kill as many enemies as possible with just one hit.

1. Second Chance

* "Odysseus" Capacitor -> Second Chance charge is auto-filled and Accumulated charge increases weapon damage.
* "Pegasus" Capacitor -> Second Chance charge is auto-filled while its auto-use instantly recharges Leap and activates an additional repair.
* "Hercules" Battery -> Accumulated Second Chance charge increases weapon damage and maximum durability until the end of the match.
* "Titan" Battery -> Second Chance auto-use activates Leap and repair. Gathering charge increases maximum durability until the end of the match.

2. Shockwave

* "Bane" Fuse -> Shockwave deals increased damage.
* "Nosferatu" Fuse -> Shockwave damage is converted to Firebug’s durability, and enemies hit by it lose repair efficiency.

3. Leap

* "Smasher" Mod. -> Leap damage upon landing is increased.
* "Second Chance" Mod. -> For every enemy hit by Leap upon landing a portion of Second Chance charge is accumulated.

4. Inferno

* "Volcano" Guidance -> Flamethrower damage is increased while charged fireballs become homing and their charge rate increases.
* "Inferno" Shocker -> Flamethrower damage is increased while charged fireball hits stun enemies.
* "Hell-fire" Guidance -> Charged fireballs become homing and their charge rate increases. Overheated enemies maximum durability is decreased.
* "Crucible" Shocker -> Сharged fireball stuns enemies. Overheated enemies maximum durability is decreased.

popular.title: PC Fútbol Legends announced for PC and mobile devices
popular.body:
Fun and humor with an arcade gameplay in medium sized fields with no fouls or offside whistled in this free to play football game.

The PC Fútbol games saga keeps growing and this new member of the family is a full arcade football game.

Developed by Purple Tree, an Argentina based studio, and Published by IDC/Games, a Spain based Game Publisher for PC and Mobile games, PC Fútbol Legends will bring a fresh feeling to a genre based more on simulators than actual arcade and full of humour games.

The game will be available for mobile users with an Android version and for PC users at IDC/Games platform and Steam. It will be localized to English, French, Italian, German, Spanish, Polish and Turkish.

Full game description and features:

PC Fútbol Legends is a dynamic arcade football game that is played in medium sized fields with no fouls or offside whistled, really in line with the old times football games from the 90's. And the most important feature of the game are humour and fun! It is so much fun to play it!

Football is all about fun and teamwork. It doesn't matter if you're on the field or play it on console sitting with your friends on the couch. PC Fútbol Legends boldly recalls the glory days of the arcade soccer games, bringing back memories of cult classics we all know. With its vintage, not-too-serious, artistic and creative modern approach to classic gameplay, PC Fútbol Legends is certainly a perfect game for people who are weary of football managers or complicated hard-core simulators. You just grab your pad, sit on the couch and play!

PC Fútbol Legends is a breakaway from the rigidity of simulators and their realism, the game brings a throwback to retro games with a fluid game play but at the same using nowadays games developing cutting edge technology.

The game controls are simple and include passing, lobbing and shooting or tackling and pushing the opponent to steal the ball. Once within the matches teams can gain temporary boosts like super-sprint, super-shots or super-tackles.

Feature list:

- Dynamic gameplay reminiscent of cult arcade soccer games
- Ideal for Couch & Party gamers
- Who needs rules? No fouls and offsides!
- Legendary players used as reference
- International Cup mode and league
- 52 national teams
- 28 hand-drawn managers
- Humor - football managers and simulators are boring. Let's bring back fun to football!

popular.title: Upgrades: Sniper
popular.body:
Below we will explain the different skill upgrades of the Bomber. The main objective of this class is to keep away the healers and the rest of DPS classes to control the map so that his team can reach the victory.

1. Cloak

* Composite Fiber Cloak -> Cloak recharge rate is increased. Active Cloak reduces incoming damage.
* Nano Repair Cloak -> Cloak recharge rate is increased. Cloak activation triggers repair procedure.
* "Assassin" Cloak -> After exiting Cloak Sniper's first shot deals extra damage. Active Cloak reduce incoming damage.
* "Ninja" Cloak -> After exiting Cloak Sniper's first shot deals extra damage. Cloak activation triggers repair procedure.

2. Recall

* "Sprint" Transceiver -> Recall recharge rate is increased.
* "Phantom" Transceiver -> Using Recall fully recharges Cloak.

3. Decoy

* "Pain" Holoprojector -> Decoy damage increases with each shot.
* "Fix" Holoprojector -> Damage inflicted by Decoy restores the owner's durability.

4. Guillotine

* "Head Cracker" Ammo -> Headshot damage and scope charge rate are increased.
* "Headhunter" Ammo -> Increased headshot damage. Hits in scope mode with a fully charge slows the enemy down. Charge is saved outside of scope mode.
* "Virus" Ammo -> Guillotine hits decrease damage dealt by the target and scope charge rate is increased.
* "Blockade" Ammo -> Guillotine hits decrease damage dealt by the target. Hits in Scope mode with a fully charge slows the enemy down. Charge is saved outside of scope mode.
popular.author: Mjölnir

popular.title: Important statement about reports
popular.body:
Hi everyone,

First of all, we want you to know that we work hard everyday to try to keep the game free from hacking.

We are thankful for all the reports you send us, as they help us block the users that manage to violate our security systems. Before you make a report, however, you need to evaluate correctly if the user is really using an illegal program or if he just plays better than you. Remember that if you are a level 1 player and you fight against a level 40 player, the second one will very likely win. But don't despair: practice makes perfect!

 

► Every report you send us is analysed by our team that spends nearly 5 minutes to check it. We receive 600 reports a day, and every 1200 reports, there is only one that actually reports a user that hacks.

 

► 99,9% of hacking users are detected by either one of the two detection levels Zula has. The first system detects and disconects the user automatically. If the first one doesn't work, the second system notifies us of the hacker. This procedure allows us to evaluate the PC process, what is influencing the game and what is the user doing. From that moment on, we can establish if the player is hacking or not, and if he is, we can penalize him.

 

► Our system detects all the illegal programs on a PC. If there's a hacking program but it's not been used while the game is open, nothing happens. Programs like cheat engine, extreme injector, hacker process, speed hack, wallhacks, speedhacks, etc are detected inside the game by our protection systems and we are informed so we can take the appropriate measures.

 

► If a user is blocked from a PC more than twice, he won't be able to access the game from that PC anymore. Even if you change the IP or the mac address of your PC, you won't be able to access Zula. If you receive the message: "You can't access Zula from this PC", your PC has been blocked. That'll teach you not to hack!

 

► Due to our aggressive policy of bans, we just have 6 or 7 penalizations a day in the last weekd. This means there is no haking inside the game: you must be very sure before you make a report.

 

► Our goal is to keep the game clean and to create a space where everyone can play with the same conditions and without tools that can jeopardize functioning of the game.

 

► Remember that every report you send us is been checked, and if it's false, that takes time from us that could be employed to create event and activities to improve the game. Be sure before you make a report that the player is really doing something wrong. To keep the game free from hacks is a responsibility we all have, and if you help us, we can keep on improving our games.

popular.author: Mjölnir

popular.title: The first massive update of PC Fútbol Stars is here!
popular.body:
Football fans, the first massive update comes to PC Fútbol Stars. It includes, among other things, the possibility of playing between the different platforms. From now on you can play with your friends, whether from IDC/Games, Steam or Google Play. This new feature brings to the game a great rise of players against whom to play and win to reach the top.

Mini Games have been added. Thanks to them you will be able to obtain great rewards every day by overcoming fun positioning challenges in which, as usual, the main objective is to score a goal! As shown in the image below the goal has 3 different ranges in which the reward varies based on the difficulty to score. Do not forget, you will always have rivals in front of you!



More than 200 new teams and 6 leagues in the game. PC Fútbol Stars receives a massive injection of new teams among which you will find teams from the Mexican, Brazilian, Argentinian or American league. Choose from the hundreds of teams you have at your disposal and find the one that will be the chosen one to reach the victory.



From now on you will be able to complete missions and win amazing rewards that are useful to sign a new coach, select a new formation from the existing ones or acquire your Dream Team. The missions will vary with the days and each one will have a special challenge thanks to which, if you reach the victory, you will get a better reward. Go for the Ultimate Prize!

We bring you a new edition of the Zula Europe Masters so you can compete with the best teams in the competitive scene of Zula.

Tournament features:

- 32 Teams. The selection of teams will be carried out based on the sign-up order.
- All matches will be best of 1 (Bo1) except the Final and the match for the third and fourth place, which will be best of 3 (Bo3).

- Veto system:

Bo1:

1. BAN 1st team
2. BAN 2nd team
3. BAN 1st team
4. BAN 2nd team
5. LAST MAP - 1st team pick side (the one in the upper bracket)

Bo3:
1. Team 1 - Ban
2. Team 2 - Ban
3. Team 1 - Choose Map | Team 2 - Choose Side
4. Team 2 - Choose Map | Team 1 - Choose Side
5. Last map - The team that wins the most rounds in the two previous matches Choose Side

- No live broadcast will be carried out.

Rewards:

1 -> 70,000 Zula Gold per player
2 -> 50,000 Zula Gold per player
3 -> 25,000 Zula Gold per player
4 -> 10,000 Zula Gold per player
5 - 8 -> 5,000 Zula Gold per player
9 -16 -> 25,000 Zula Points per player
17 - 32 -> 10,000 Zula Points per player

You can check all the information here.

See you on the battlefield!

popular.title: Project Xandata Closed Beta Tournament
popular.body:
Hello, Xandats!

If you want to compete, this is your chance!

Join the Project Xandata Closed Beta Tournament and win a prize of 50 € per player added to the IDC Wallet!

Date: 16/05/2020
Hour: 18:00 (CEST)

Click here to check all the details and rules. Below you will fin a summary of how the matches will be carried out:

Matches will be played with the Best of 3 system.

Map and Game Mode veto:

- Round 1 - Team 1 selects game mode and Team 2 selects map.
- Round 2 - Team 2 selects game mode and Team 1 selects map.
- Round 3 - Last game mode and map.

IMPORTANT: It is not possible to repeat maps or game modes
IMPORTANT: the amount of 50 € will be added to the IDC Wallet and may be used in the future for the acquisition of products from the IDC/Games platform such as pay to play games or in-game items and currencies.

Good luck!

- 32 Teams. The selection of teams will be carried out based on the sign-up order.
- All matches will be best of 1 (Bo1) except the Final and the match for the third and fourth place, which will be best of 3 (Bo3).

- Veto system:

Bo1:

1. BAN 1st team
2. BAN 2nd team
3. BAN 1st team
4. BAN 2nd team
5. LAST MAP - 1st team pick side (the one in the upper bracket)

Bo3:
1. Team 1 - Ban
2. Team 2 - Ban
3. Team 1 - Choose Map | Team 2 - Choose Side
4. Team 2 - Choose Map | Team 1 - Choose Side
5. Last map - The team that wins the most rounds in the two previous matches Choose Side

- No live broadcast will be carried out.

Rewards:

1 -> 80,000 Zula Gold per player
2 -> 60,000 Zula Gold per player
3 -> 30,000 Zula Gold per player
4 - 8 -> 10,000 Zula Gold per player
9 -16 -> 50,000 Zula Points per player
17 - 32 -> 25,000 Zula Points per player

You can check all the information here.

See you on the battlefield!

popular.title: IDC/Games Event - Capture the flag
popular.body:
Grab the flag and score for your team!

Game modes: Capture the flag

Room Name: IDC/Games Event.

Rules:

- Winner players will not be able to play again on the event. Meaning you can only win 1 time.
- If a user creates rooms with this name to distract other players, he will be banned permanently.
- There should be an Admin (GM) on the room, if not the room is not the official one.
- If a player breaks one of these rules, he won't receive any reward.

Event Rewards:

2.000 Zula Gold for all the members of the winner team.
